feher_ruha.prompt: A full body shot of a fitted, knee-length white cotton dress, with the camera slowly pushing in from slightly below to highlight the graceful silhouette and gentle movement of the fabric. The scene then shifts to a close-up, capturing the elegant texture of the cotton, before transitioning to a waist-up view that gently pans left, emphasizing the flattering fit around the waist and the soft flow of the skirt.
